import React, { Component, Suspense } from 'react' class EachRestaurant extends Component { render() { return (

{this.props.store.name}

{this.props.store.rating} /5

{this.props.store.phone}

{this.props.store.location.address1}

) } } const eachBox = { minWidth: '900px', marginLeft: '20px', marginTop: '25px', marginBottom: '15px', border: 'solid grey 0.4px', backgroundColor: '#FF6961', height: '355px', borderRadius: '10px', marginRight: '20px', fontFamily:'\'Source Sans Pro\', sans-serif;', display: 'flex', boxShadow : '2px 2px 2px 2px #C8C8C8', overflow: 'hidden', color: 'white', } const outlineGlow = { boxShadow : '10px 10px 8px 10px #888888', backgroundColor: 'blue', } const imageContainerStyle = { borderRadius: '10px', flex: '0.75', overflow: 'hidden', minWidth: '350px', } const descriptionStyle = { flex: '3', } const imageStyle = { marginTop: '20px', marginLeft: '20px', height: '90%', width: '90%', borderRadius: '10px', } const nameAndRatingStyle = { borderRadius: '10px', width: '100%', height: '40%', backgroundColor: '#FF6961', display: 'flex', margin: '0', } const textStyle = { paddingLeft: '15px', } const nameStyle = { borderRadius: '10px', flex: '1', backgroundColor: '#FF6961', minWidth: '400px', overflow: 'hidden', } const ratingStyle = { paddingTop: '10px', fontSize: '25px', flex: '3.5', } export default EachRestaurant
